verbs.description: [ARG0: Senator] [V: accuses] [ARG1: Trump administration] [ARG2: of dragging its feet on new safety standards for shipment of oil by train through the U.S.]
Senator accuses [ARG0: Trump administration] of [V: dragging] [ARG1: its feet] [ARG2: on new safety standards for shipment of oil by train through the U.S.]
